snippet: Alexis Jones scored 22 points to lead No. 2 Duke (9-0) in a 99-78 home victory over No. 16 Purdue in a Big Ten/Atlantic Coast Conference Challenge game.
abstract: Duke defeats Purdue, 99-78, in a Big Ten/Atlantic Coast Conference Challenge game.; other women's college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Alexis Jones scored 22 points to lead No. 2 Duke (9-0) in a 99-78 home victory over No. 16 Purdue in a Big Ten/Atlantic Coast Conference Challenge game.

headline.main: Duke and UConn Both Win Easily
